li.a: I'm a New Brighton Lion (PTO) Facebook Page

div.h1: Welcome to The NEW BRIGHTON AREA School District
div.p: Our district is located in the middle of Beaver County, Pennsylvania. It encompasses the communities of New Brighton Borough, Daugherty Township, Pulaski Township, and Fallston Borough. Over 12,500 people live in the 12 square miles of the district.
The New Brighton Area School District has a long and rich tradition of academic excellence and producing well rounded individuals that are prepared for life's challenges.
Our town and surrounding areas has plenty to offer prospective families looking for affordable housing and a town that has a sense of community, along with a fantastic downtown facade.

div.span: The Sunrise Pool is open year round to residents and non-residents. Open swim, lap swim, classes, and parties are all available at Sunrise Pool.
LOLA is New Brighton Area School District's online learning platform for students in K-12. We offer in-school, hybrid, and fully online options.
NBASD offers a rich selection of athletic, band, and extracurricular opportunities. Encourage your child to learn more and become involved.
Great things are happening in New Brighton Borough. Check out their website for the latest news on town events, activities, and local information.

br.p: Check out this news story to see the Kindergarten Year in Review show, celebrating our Kindergarten Class of 2020!
Please consider participating in our annual Title I Parent/Guardian Survey....
Enroll now for Tiny Tots 2020-2021 program.

From March 13, 2020 through the end of the Coronavirus pandemic and school closures, anyone wishing to enroll in the New Brighton Area School District should contact Renee Scobie at rscobie@nbasd.org or 724-843-1795 x405. Please leave a voicemail and we will return your call within 24 hours.
